name: whatsdone
description: Take a memo of what you've done today
author: Ryuichi Inagaki

scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run coverage:backend
scripts.coverage:backend: (cd modules/env/whatsdone-app/src && npm install && npm run report-coverage)
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: (cd modules/env/whatsdone-app/src && npm install && npm run lint)
scripts.lint:frontend: (cd modules/env/whatsdone-assets && npm install && npm run lint)
